title: Pokemon XYZ Episode 38 Ash Vs Alain Final Batte Mega Charizard Vs Grenin...

embed.description: Pokemon XYZ Episode 38 Ash Vs Alain Final Batte HD Pokemon XYZ 38 Episode 38 Pokemon XY and Z Episode 38 39 Pokemon XY & Z Episode 38 カロスリーグ優勝！ サトシ頂上決戦！！ Kalos League Victory! Ash's Ultimate Match!!) is the 38th episode of Pokémon the Series: XYZ.Ash and Alain's fierce fight in the Kalos League finals continues on.

body:
Tanto hype con la rana y el barnie para que ellos se lleven la liga para Alain.

PD : Pikachu casi y completa el milagro.
